name: Roasted Sweet Potatoes & Onions
author: Jean Carper
summary: This delicious side dish is packed with nutrition. Sweet potatoes, onions and almonds are powerhouses of antioxidants and other nutrients -- in fact, almonds are among the most nutrient-dense foods, containing high concentrations of vitamins and minerals per calorie. Plus, olive oil and almonds contain monounsaturated fat -- the good type.
ingredients: 2 large sweet potatoes, peeled and cut in 1-inch chunks
2 medium Vidalia or other sweet onions, cut in 1-inch chunks
Salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
directions: Toss first 6 ingredients in a shallow medium-sized baking dish
